general_advisory: Planting of crops should be done after checking the weather forecast. Keep poultry indoors during heavy rainfall.

advisory: Sow seeds after the last frost date.
Provide sufficient water for proper growth.
Protect from frost during early stages of growth.
Maintain soil moisture for good kernel development.
Protect from strong winds during pollination.
Ensure proper ventilation in poultry houses.
Keep feed and water sources clean.
